Articles.Content:
Hey there commmunity! I\'ve just bought the game and I am on my quest to conquer the galaxy (eventually)!

From what I have seen in videos the game is a lot of fun and It has a lot of potential. Let it grow in the right direction and it will achieve great things!

Ps to developers: I\'ve heard about you from Northernlion\'s youtube channel. I really think you should thank him somehow in a near future. I am positive that you owe him a couple of sold copies

CHEERS!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the forums!

Nice to see KSP is being featured more on YouTube.
